description: 4 clusters of related notes connected by bridge notes. Each cluster internally well-connected. Tests bridge emergence, betweenness centrality, and cluster merging.

notes.title: Domain Driven Design
notes.content:
# Domain Driven Design

Integrates with [[Technical Debt]], [[Agile]], [[API-First]].

Also connects to [[Redis]], [[Microservices]], [[Observability]].

k8s expertise is relevant here.
Uses thread-safety conventions.
Related to Node.js.

notes.title: Bridge: frontend-backend
notes.content:
# Bridge: frontend to backend

Nadia works across both frontend and backend.

## frontend Side
Connects to [[Continuous Integration]] and [[AWS]].

## backend Side
Connects to [[Event Sourcing]] and [[React]].
